forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Thunder possible. High around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Thunder possible. High near 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 39F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High near 50F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 40F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 42F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 49F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 38F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain transitioning to a few showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain tapering to a few showers late. High 51F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 34F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 59F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
